short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan a Tether Point to quickly and safely send cryptocurrencies such as BNB, WIRE, CAKE, CARDANO & DOGE to the associated wallet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wire aims to increase the adoption of Blockchain technologies by providing tools and plugins to the general public. The Wire Link Chrome Extension enables users to scan Tether Points (generated by www.wirelink.app) and send cryptocurrencies directly to the associated wallet, instantly.
